com.philips.cdp.registration.settings

Class RegistrationHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.philips.cdp.registration.settings.RegistrationHelper

  • public class RegistrationHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    RegistrationHelper class represents the entry point for User Registration component. It exposes APIs to be used when User Registration is intended to be integrated by any application.

      • registerUserRegistrationListener

        public void registerUserRegistrationListener(com.philips.cdp.registration.listener.UserRegistrationListener userRegistrationListener)
        registerUserRegistrationListener method registers a listener in order to listen the callbacks returned by User Registration component. It must be called by integrating applications to be able to listen to User Registration events.
        Parameters:
        userRegistrationListener -

      • unRegisterUserRegistrationListener

        public void unRegisterUserRegistrationListener(com.philips.cdp.registration.listener.UserRegistrationListener userRegistrationListener)
        unRegisterUserRegistrationListener method unregisters the listener registered via registerUserRegistrationListener method. This will make integrating applications to stop listening to User Registration events.
        Parameters:
        userRegistrationListener -

      • registerHSDPAuthenticationListener

        public void registerHSDPAuthenticationListener(HSDPAuthenticationListener hsdpAuthenticationListener)
        registerHSDPAuthenticationListener method registers a listener in order to listen the callbacks returned by User Registration component. It must be called by integrating applications to be able to listen to User Registration events.
        Parameters:
        hsdpAuthenticationListener -

      • unRegisterHSDPAuthenticationListener

        public void unRegisterHSDPAuthenticationListener(HSDPAuthenticationListener hsdpAuthenticationListener)
        unRegisterHSDPAuthenticationListener method unregisters the listener registered via registerUserRegistrationListener method. This will make integrating applications to stop listening to User Registration events.
        Parameters:
        hsdpAuthenticationListener -
